channel.title: Fool taking multiple charges
channel.description:
This just happened to me, and I believe it has happened before which is why I was extra careful about noticing it:
I was GK, I did nothing D1 and D2. D3 we executed a fool, and I lost TWO charges from each ability.
This is a game-breaking bug.
